name: CUSTOM Featured (tabs) #3
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal

  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient

  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy
  assign section_radius = section.settings.section_radius

  assign heading = section.settings.heading
  assign heading_size = section.settings.heading_size
  assign heading_size_mobile = section.settings.heading_size_mobile
  assign heading_custom = section.settings.heading_custom
  assign heading_font = section.settings.heading_font
  assign heading_height = section.settings.heading_height
  assign heading_color = section.settings.heading_color
  assign heading_align = section.settings.heading_align
  assign heading_align_mobile = section.settings.heading_align_mobile

  assign tabs_gap = section.settings.tabs_gap

  assign slider_view_mobile = section.settings.slider_view_mobile

  assign main_card_padding_horizontal = section.settings.main_card_padding_horizontal
  assign main_card_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.main_card_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign main_card_padding_vertical = section.settings.main_card_padding_vertical

  assign main_card_radius = section.settings.main_card_radius
  assign main_card_border_thickness = section.settings.main_card_border_thickness
  assign main_card_border_color = section.settings.main_card_border_color
  assign main_card_align = section.settings.main_card_align
  assign main_card_align_mobile = section.settings.main_card_align_mobile
  assign main_card_hide_mobile = section.settings.main_card_hide_mobile

  assign main_card_horizontal_align = ""
  if main_card_align == "center"
    assign main_card_horizontal_align = "center"
  elsif main_card_align == "right"
    assign main_card_horizontal_align = "end"
  else
    assign main_card_horizontal_align = "start"
  endif

  assign main_card_horizontal_align_mobile = ""
  if main_card_align_mobile == "center"
    assign main_card_horizontal_align_mobile = "center"
  elsif main_card_align_mobile == "right"
    assign main_card_horizontal_align_mobile = "end"
  else
    assign main_card_horizontal_align_mobile = "start"
  endif

  assign main_card_text_size = section.settings.main_card_text_size
  assign main_card_text_size_mobile = section.settings.main_card_text_size_mobile
  assign main_card_text_custom = section.settings.main_card_text_custom
  assign main_card_text_font = section.settings.main_card_text_font
  assign main_card_text_height = section.settings.main_card_text_height
  assign main_card_text_color = section.settings.main_card_text_color

  assign main_card_button_size = section.settings.main_card_button_size
  assign main_card_button_size_mobile = section.settings.main_card_button_size_mobile
  assign main_card_button_color = section.settings.main_card_button_color
  assign main_card_button_hover_color = section.settings.main_card_button_hover_color
  assign main_card_button_custom = section.settings.main_card_button_custom
  assign main_card_button_font = section.settings.main_card_button_font
  assign main_card_button_height = section.settings.main_card_button_height
  assign main_card_button_padding_vertical = section.settings.main_card_button_padding_vertical
  assign main_card_button_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.main_card_button_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign main_card_button_padding_horizontal = section.settings.main_card_button_padding_horizontal
  assign main_card_button_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.main_card_button_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign main_card_button_radius = section.settings.main_card_button_radius
  assign main_card_button_border_thickness = section.settings.main_card_button_border_thickness
  assign main_card_button_border_color = section.settings.main_card_button_border_color
  assign main_card_button_border_hover_color = section.settings.main_card_button_border_hover_color
  assign main_card_button_bg_color = section.settings.main_card_button_bg_color
  assign main_card_button_bg_hover_color = section.settings.main_card_button_bg_hover_color
  assign main_card_button_style = section.settings.main_card_button_style

  assign image_radius = section.settings.image_radius
  assign image_border_thickness = section.settings.image_border_thickness
  assign image_border_color = section.settings.image_border_color
  assign image_ratio = section.settings.image_ratio
  assign image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.image_ratio_mobile
  assign second_image_hover = section.settings.second_image_hover

  assign badge_padding_horizontal = section.settings.badge_padding_horizontal
  assign badge_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.badge_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign badge_padding_vertical = section.settings.badge_padding_vertical
  assign badge_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.badge_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign badge_bg_color = section.settings.badge_bg_color
  assign badge_border_thickness = section.settings.badge_border_thickness
  assign badge_border_color = section.settings.badge_border_color
  assign badge_border_style = section.settings.badge_border_style
  assign badge_radius = section.settings.badge_radius
  assign badge_custom = section.settings.badge_custom
  assign badge_font = section.settings.badge_font
  assign badge_size = section.settings.badge_size
  assign badge_size_mobile = section.settings.badge_size_mobile
  assign badge_height = section.settings.badge_height
  assign badge_color = section.settings.badge_color 

  assign product_button = section.settings.product_button
  assign product_button_size = section.settings.product_button_size
  assign product_button_size_mobile = section.settings.product_button_size_mobile
  assign product_button_color = section.settings.product_button_color
  assign product_button_hover_color = section.settings.product_button_hover_color
  assign product_button_custom = section.settings.product_button_custom
  assign product_button_font = section.settings.product_button_font
  assign product_button_height = section.settings.product_button_height
  assign product_button_padding_vertical = section.settings.product_button_padding_vertical
  assign product_button_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.product_button_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign product_button_padding_horizontal = section.settings.product_button_padding_horizontal
  assign product_button_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.product_button_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign product_button_radius = section.settings.product_button_radius
  assign product_button_border_thickness = section.settings.product_button_border_thickness
  assign product_button_border_color = section.settings.product_button_border_color
  assign product_button_border_hover_color = section.settings.product_button_border_hover_color
  assign product_button_bg_color = section.settings.product_button_bg_color
  assign product_button_bg_hover_color = section.settings.product_button_bg_hover_color
  assign product_button_mt_mobile = section.settings.product_button_mt_mobile
  assign product_button_style = section.settings.product_button_style
  assign product_button_align = section.settings.product_button_align
  assign product_button_align_mobile = section.settings.product_button_align_mobile

  assign title_custom = section.settings.title_custom
  assign title_font = section.settings.title_font
  assign title_size = section.settings.title_size
  assign title_size_mobile = section.settings.title_size_mobile
  assign title_height = section.settings.title_height
  assign title_color = section.settings.title_color    
  assign title_mt = section.settings.title_mt
  assign title_mt_mobile = section.settings.title_mt_mobile

  assign product_info_top_mt = section.settings.product_info_top_mt
  assign product_info_top_mt_mobile = section.settings.product_info_top_mt_mobile

  assign tagline_custom = section.settings.tagline_custom
  assign tagline_font = section.settings.tagline_font
  assign tagline_size = section.settings.tagline_size
  assign tagline_size_mobile = section.settings.tagline_size_mobile
  assign tagline_height = section.settings.tagline_height
  assign tagline_color = section.settings.tagline_color 

  assign price_size_mobile = section.settings.price_size_mobile
  assign price_size = section.settings.price_size
  assign price_color = section.settings.price_color
  assign price_original_color = section.settings.price_original_color
  assign price_custom = section.settings.price_custom
  assign price_font = section.settings.price_font
  assign price_height = section.settings.price_height
  assign price_compare = section.settings.price_compare

  assign product_info_bottom_mt = section.settings.product_info_bottom_mt
  assign product_info_bottom_mt_mobile = section.settings.product_info_bottom_mt_mobile

  assign text_custom = section.settings.text_custom
  assign text_font = section.settings.text_font
  assign text_size = section.settings.text_size
  assign text_size_mobile = section.settings.text_size_mobile
  assign text_height = section.settings.text_height
  assign text_color = section.settings.text_color
  assign text_length = section.settings.text_length
  assign text_length = text_length | plus: 0


  assign link = section.settings.link
  assign link_custom = section.settings.link_custom
  assign link_font = section.settings.link_font
  assign link_size = section.settings.link_size
  assign link_size_mobile = section.settings.link_size_mobile
  assign link_height = section.settings.link_height
  assign link_color = section.settings.link_color

  assign arrow_size = section.settings.arrow_size
  assign arrow_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_size_mobile
  assign arrow_icon_size = section.settings.arrow_icon_size
  assign arrow_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_icon_size_mobile
  assign arrow_color = section.settings.arrow_color
  assign arrow_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_hover_color
  assign arrow_bg_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_color
  assign arrow_bg_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_hover_color
  assign arrow_radius = section.settings.arrow_radius
  assign arrow_border_thickness = section.settings.arrow_border_thickness
  assign arrow_border_color = section.settings.arrow_border_color
  assign arrow_border_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_border_hover_color
  assign arrow_show_desktop = section.settings.arrow_show_desktop
  assign arrow_show_mobile = section.settings.arrow_show_mobile
  assign arrow_hover_effect = section.settings.arrow_hover_effect
-%}

{%- style -%}
  {{ heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ tab_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ main_card_text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ main_card_button_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}  
  {{ badge_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ title_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ tagline_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ price_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ link_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ product_button_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }
  
  .featured-heading-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: {{ heading_align_mobile }};
  }

  .featured-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0px;
    font-size: {{ heading_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ heading_height }}%;
    color: {{ heading_color }};
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
    font-weight: 700;
  }

  .featured-tabs-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ tabs_mt_mobile }}px;
    max-width: fit-content;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
  }

  .featured-tabs-{{ section.id }} {
    -webkit-overflow-scrolling: auto; /* no momentum scrolling on iOS Safari */
    overscroll-behavior: none;        /* helps on modern Android/Chrome/Edge */
    overflow-x: scroll;
    overflow-y: hidden;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    overflow-x: scroll;
    gap: {{ tabs_gap_mobile }}px;
    scrollbar-width: none;
  }

  .featured-tabs-{{ section.id }}::-webkit-scrollbar {
    display: none;
  }

  .featured-tab-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;
    font-size: {{ tab_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ tab_height }}%;
    color: {{ tab_color }};
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: normal;
    text-wrap: nowrap;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-weight: 700;
  }

  .featured-tabs-line-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block !important;
    width: 100%;
    margin-top: 10px;
    position: relative;
    height: {{ tab_line_height }}px;
    background-color: {{ tab_line_color }};
    border-radius: 100px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .featured-tabs-line-{{ section.id }}::after {
    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    height: 100%;
    top: 0;
    left: var(--active-tab-left, 0);
    width: var(--active-tab-width, 0%);
    background-color: {{ tab_active_line_color }};
    z-index: 2;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .featured-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none !important;
    overflow: visible;
    position: relative;
    margin-top: {{ slider_mt_mobile }}px !important;
    margin-left: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    margin-right: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
  }

  .featured-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    overflow: visible;
  }

  .featured-slider-{{ section.id }}.active {
    display: block !important;
  }

  .featured-main-slide-{{ section.id }} {   
    height: auto !important;
    border: {{ main_card_border_thickness }}px solid {{ main_card_border_color }} !important;
    border-radius: {{ main_card_radius }}px !important;
    overflow: hidden;
    box-sizing: border-box !important;
  }

  .featured-main-slide-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: space-between;
    gap: 20px;
    height: 100%;
    align-items: {{ main_card_horizontal_align_mobile }};  
    padding: {{ main_card_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ main_card_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
  }

  .featured-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    height: auto !important;
    box-sizing: border-box !important;
  }

  .featured-main-slide-text-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: {{ main_card_align_mobile }};
  }

  .featured-main-slide-text-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0px;
    font-size: {{ main_card_text_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ main_card_text_height }}%;
    color: {{ main_card_text_color }};
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
    cursor: pointer;
  }

  .featured-main-button-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 10px;
    width: 100%;
    max-width: fit-content;
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ main_card_button_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ main_card_button_color }};
    line-height: {{ main_card_button_height }}%;
    text-align: center;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
    padding: {{ main_card_button_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ main_card_button_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ main_card_button_radius }}px;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    background-color: transparent;
    border: 0px;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-weight: 700;
  }

  .featured-main-button-mobile-{{ section.id }} {
    position: relative;
    top: unset;
    left: unset;
    transform: none;
    display: block;
  }

  .featured-main-button-desktop-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute;
    top: 95%;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translateX(-50%);
    display: none;
  }

  .featured-main-button-inner-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 10px;
  }

  .featured-main-button-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    color: {{ main_card_button_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .featured-main-button-{{ section.id }} svg {
    width: 14px;
    height: 14px;
    border: none;
    background-color: transparent !important;
  }

  .featured-main-button-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ main_card_button_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .featured-main-button-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path {
    fill: {{ main_card_button_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .featured-badge-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute;
    top: 15px;
    left: 15px;
    z-index: 2;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    padding: {{ badge_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ badge_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    background-color: {{ badge_bg_color }};
    border: {{ badge_border_thickness }}px {{ badge_border_style }} {{ badge_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ badge_radius }}px;
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ badge_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ badge_color }};
    word-break: break-word;
    line-height: {{ badge_height }}%;
    overflow: hidden;
    text-align: center;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .featured-product-button-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 10px;
    width: 100%;
    max-width: fit-content;
    margin: 0;   
    font-size: {{ product_button_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ product_button_color }};
    line-height: {{ product_button_height }}%;
    text-align: center;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
    padding: {{ product_button_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ product_button_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ product_button_radius }}px;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    background-color: transparent;
    border: 0px;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-weight: 700;
  }

  .featured-product-button-{{ section.id }}.desktop {
    display: none;
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 0;
    transition: all 0.5s ease 0s;
  }

  .featured-product-button-{{ section.id }}.mobile {
    margin-top: {{ product_button_mt_mobile }}px;
    display: block;
  }

  .collection-button-inner-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 10px;
  }

  .featured-product-button-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    color: {{ product_button_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .featured-product-button-{{ section.id }} svg {
    width: 14px;
    height: 14px;
    background-color: transparent !important;
  }

  .featured-product-button-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ product_button_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .featured-product-button-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path {
    fill: {{ product_button_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .featured-product-image-{{ section.id }} {
    position: relative;
    width: 100%;
    border: {{ image_border_thickness }}px solid {{ image_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ image_radius }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .featured-image-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block;
  }

  .featured-image-{{ section.id }} > img,
  .featured-image-{{ section.id }} > svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .featured-image-{{ section.id }} {
    height: 100%;
  }

  .featured-product-title-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;   
    width: 100%;  
    text-align: {{ product_content_align_mobile }};
    margin-top: {{ title_mt_mobile }}px;
    font-size: {{ title_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ title_color }};
    line-height: {{ title_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    font-weight: 700;
  }  

  .featured-product-info-top-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 10px;
    justify-content: space-between;
    margin-top: {{ product_info_top_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .featured-product-tagline-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ tagline_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ tagline_color }};
    line-height: {{ tagline_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
  } 
  
  .featured-price-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ price_mt_mobile }}px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: {{ slide_content_horizontal_align_mobile }};
    gap: 5px;
  }

  .featured-price-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ price_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ price_color }};
    line-height: {{ price_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 700;
  }

  .collection-compare-price-{{ section.id }} {
    opacity: 0.8;
    font-size: {{ price_size_mobile | times: 0.8 }}px;
    color: {{ price_original_color }};
    text-decoration: line-through !important;
  }

  .featured-product-info-bottom-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 10px;
    justify-content: space-between;
    margin-top: {{ product_info_bottom_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .featured-product-text-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ text_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ text_color }};
    line-height: {{ text_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
  }  

  .featured-product-link-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ link_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ link_color }};
    line-height: {{ link_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-wrap: nowrap;
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    z-index: 2;
    transform: translateY(-50%);
    width: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    border: 0px;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ arrow_radius }}px;
    background: transparent;
    background: {{ arrow_bg_color }};
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
    /* box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 0px rgba(0,0,0,.15); */
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
    left: 5%;    
  }

  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    right: 5%;    
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon,
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon {
    pointer-events: none;
    place-items: center;
    display: grid;
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    transform: rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border-style: solid;
    border: 0px;
    border-right: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-top: 2px solid currentColor;
    position: relative;
    left: -1px;
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    left: unset;
    right: -1px;
    border-right: 0px;
    border-top: 0px;
    border-bottom: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-left: 2px solid currentColor;
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    height: 1.6px;
    transform-origin: center;
    opacity: 0;
    background: currentColor;
    transform: scaleX(.5);
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} span,
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} span {
    color: {{ arrow_color }};
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled {
    opacity: 0;
  }
  
  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
      margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;

    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {

    .featured-heading-{{ section.id }} {

    .featured-tabs-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {

    .featured-tabs-{{ section.id }} {

    }

    }

    .featured-slider-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ slider_mt }}px !important;

      margin-right: -{{ padding_horizontal }}rem !important;

      align-items: stretch !important;
    }

    .featured-main-slide-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
      align-items: {{ main_card_horizontal_align }};     
      padding: {{ main_card_padding_vertical }}px {{ main_card_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    }

    .featured-main-button-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ main_card_button_padding_vertical }}px {{ main_card_button_padding_horizontal }}px;
      font-size: {{ main_card_button_size }}px;
    }

      padding: {{ badge_padding_vertical }}px {{ badge_padding_horizontal}}px;

    }

    .featured-product-button-{{ section.id }} {

      display: block;
    }

    .featured-product-button-{{ section.id }}.mobile {
      margin-top: {{ product_button_mt_mobile }}px;

    .featured-product-title-{{ section.id }} {

    .featured-price-{{ section.id }} {

    .featured-product-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ text_size }}px;
    }  

    .featured-product-link-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ link_size }}px;
    }  

    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
      opacity: 0;
    }

    .featured-slider-{{ section.id }}:hover .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .featured-slider-{{ section.id }}:hover .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
      opacity: 1;
    }

    .featured-slider-{{ section.id }}:hover .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
    .featured-slider-{{ section.id }}:hover .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled {
      opacity: 0;
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    }

    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
    }

    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    } 
  }

<script>
  function loadSwiper(callback) {
    if (window.Swiper) {
      callback();
    } else {
      const script = document.createElement('script');
      script.src = "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.js";
      script.onload = callback;
      document.head.appendChild(script);
    }
  }

  function initFeaturedCollectionTabs3(sectionId) {
    document.querySelector(`.featured-collections-${sectionId}`).classList.remove('preview');

    const slider = new Swiper(`.featured-slider-${sectionId}`, {
      speed: 300,
      navigation: {
        nextEl: `.featured-btn-next-${sectionId}`,
        prevEl: `.featured-btn-prev-${sectionId}`,
      },
      breakpoints: {
        320: {
          spaceBetween: parseInt(document.querySelector(`.featured-slider-${sectionId}`).dataset.gapMobile || 0),
          slidesPerView: parseFloat(document.querySelector(`.featured-slider-${sectionId}`).dataset.viewMobile || 1),
        },
        768: {
          spaceBetween: parseInt(document.querySelector(`.featured-slider-${sectionId}`).dataset.gap || 0),
          slidesPerView: parseFloat(document.querySelector(`.featured-slider-${sectionId}`).dataset.view || 3),
        },
        1024: {
          spaceBetween: parseInt(document.querySelector(`.featured-slider-${sectionId}`).dataset.gap || 0),
          slidesPerView: parseFloat(document.querySelector(`.featured-slider-${sectionId}`).dataset.view || 3),
        }
      }
    });

    const sliders = document.querySelectorAll(`.featured-slider-${sectionId}`);
    const tabs = document.querySelectorAll(`.featured-tab-${sectionId}`);
    const tabsLine = document.querySelector(`.featured-tabs-line-${sectionId}`);

    if(tabs) {
      const firstTab = tabs[0];
      if (firstTab) {
        const tabRect = firstTab.getBoundingClientRect();
        const tabsContainerRect = tabsLine.parentElement.getBoundingClientRect();

        const initialLeft = tabRect.left - tabsContainerRect.left;
        const initialWidth = tabRect.width;

        tabsLine.style.setProperty('--active-tab-left', `${initialLeft}px`);
        tabsLine.style.setProperty('--active-tab-width', `${initialWidth}px`);
      }

      tabs.forEach(tab => {
        tab.addEventListener('click', () => {
          sliders.forEach(slider => {
            slider.classList.remove('active')
          });
          tabs.forEach(tab => {
            tab.classList.remove('active')
          });          
           
          sliders.forEach(slider => {
            if(tab.id === slider.getAttribute('data-id')) {
              slider.classList.add('active');
              tab.classList.add('active');
      
              const tabsContainer = tab.parentElement;
              const tabRect = tab.getBoundingClientRect();
              const containerRect = tabsContainer.getBoundingClientRect();
              
              //  getBoundingClientRect     
              const newLeft = tabRect.left - containerRect.left;
              const newWidth = tab.offsetWidth;
              
              tabsLine.style.setProperty('--active-tab-left', `${newLeft}px`);
              tabsLine.style.setProperty('--active-tab-width', `${newWidth}px`);
      
              //   
              const hasScroll = tabsContainer.scrollWidth > tabsContainer.clientWidth;
      
            if (hasScroll) {
              const containerWidth = tabsContainer.offsetWidth;
              const scrollPosition = tab.offsetLeft - (containerWidth / 2) + (tab.offsetWidth / 2);
            
              // Smoothly scroll so the tab is centered
              tabsContainer.scrollTo({
                left: scrollPosition,
                behavior: 'smooth'
              });
            
              // After scrolling is complete (or mostly complete), update line position once
              setTimeout(() => {
                const updatedTabRect = tab.getBoundingClientRect();
                const updatedContainerRect = tabsContainer.getBoundingClientRect();
                const updatedLeft = updatedTabRect.left - updatedContainerRect.left;
                const updatedWidth = tab.offsetWidth;
            
                tabsLine.style.setProperty('--active-tab-left', `${updatedLeft}px`);
                tabsLine.style.setProperty('--active-tab-width', `${updatedWidth}px`);
              }, 300);
            }
            } else {
              slider.classList.remove('active');
              tab.classList.add('active');
            }
          })
        })        
      })
    }


  }

  function initializeAllFeaturedCollectionTabs3Sections() {
    const sections = document.querySelectorAll('[id^="shopify-section-"]');
    sections.forEach(section => {
      if (section.querySelector('.featured-{{ section.id }}')) {
        const sectionId = section.id.replace('shopify-section-', '');
        loadSwiper(() => initFeaturedCollectionTabs3(sectionId));
      }
    });
  }

  if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initializeAllFeaturedCollectionTabs3Sections);
  } else {
    initializeAllFeaturedCollectionTabs3Sections();
  }

  if (Shopify.designMode) {
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', (event) => {
      const sectionId = event.detail.sectionId;
      if (event.target.querySelector('.featured-{{ section.id }}')) {
        loadSwiper(() => initFeaturedCollectionTabs3(sectionId));
      }
    });
  }

</script>

product_button.label: Button label
product_button.description: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

background_gradient.label: Section background gradient
background_gradient.description: Remove gradient to replace with solid colors

lazy.label: Lazy load
lazy.description: Lazy load images for speed optimisation
